title: 4-Sixes Liquors
description: Website built for a local small business. Uses WordPress as a headless CMS, Gatsby as the static site generator, and deploys to Netlify.
technologies: Wordpress, Gatsby, Netlify, React, GraphQL, Sass

title: Mayhem
description: Website for a local small professional wrestling organization. Affords the client the ability to alter the roster, add new upcoming events with details, among other benefits.
technologies: Wordpress, ACF, Gatsby, Netlify, React, GraphQL, Sass
